original_text: My friends, if you see that someone among you is doing a wrong thing, you must warn that person. Those of you who have help from God's Spirit should tell that person how to live in a good way. But you must be patient and respect him. Be very careful yourselves, so that you do not also want to do wrong things.
korean_text: 형제들아 사람이 만일 무슨 범죄한 일이 드러나거든 신령한 너희는 온유한 심령으로 그러한 자를 바로잡고 너 자신을 살펴보아 너도 시험을 받을까 두려워하라

sentences.original_text: if you see that someone among you
Those of you who have help from God's Spirit
should tell that person how to live in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람에게 선한 방식으로 사는 법을 알려주어야 한다

sentences.original_text: so that you do not also want to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 함으로써 너희 역시 잘못된 일을 하고 싶은 마음이 생기지 않게 하라
